description: Converting PSD and mockups to HTML. Creating Responsive and Retina ready websites. Creating Views and Controllers for Laravel Application.

Developed many directives using Angular.js. Converting PSDs and mockups to working web pages. Data binding REST APIs to front-end application. Creating Responsive, pixel perfect design and Retina ready websites.

Developed Windows services and applications. Developed Web services and REST APIs. Redesigning and Updating existing websites and applications. Develop mobile applications using Angular.js and Phonegap. Creating MSSQL stored procedures.
